creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: portrait of a figure in profile view, with colorful imagery inside figure; smoking cigar in mouth of figure, with mustache, bushy eyebrows and dark hair; image of colorful tree, with the branches cut off in the center of the figure's face; burning house in chest area, with a serpent-like creature with jagged teeth coming out of the doorway of the house; severed leg at PL shoulder; thin, colorful squiggly lines throughout; tiny arm extending off of the PR shoulder; white background
inscription: llC, in pencil: Davis, Ca | Feb. 1981 #8 | \"Self-Portrait: I Feel Like Fire Today!\"
provenance: [Candy Store Gallery, Folsom, Calif.]; Private collection, New York; [George Adams Gallery, New York, sold to Mersky, July 2020]; Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2020.
title: Self-Portrait: I Feel Like Fire Today!
